reviews.review: Um jogos legal com amigos, mas já que eu não tenho amigos não serve para mim.

Es una COMPLETA MIERD4, llena de puros tramposos, asesinos mas bufeados que misil nuclear, hitbox mas falsos que billete de 3 dolares, no vale la mas minima pena este juego de porqueria, los desarrolladores parecen no tener neuronas
好玩是好玩，但是对新手很不友好，特别是屠夫，很难，玩人也挺难的，游戏是好游戏。
鯖のマナーが悪すぎる

I really like this game. I played for 39 hours in the first 3 days so I guess that is saying something. I don't really know what else to say other than I highly recommend it. This is also my first review so it must be a pretty dang good game for me to review it.
Its scary, and I want to go watch a horror movie now
fun game till you get banned for telling someone that they are being an asshole and they get butt hurt so they report you. 10/10 definitly play worthy.
你改的太好了 我很满意 玩的很开心 给你个差评 怕你骄傲

一局游戏的胜负，取决于某些关键人物。
我选人 鬼赢，我选鬼 人赢。
lots of fun and good coop game

이토록 점수를 -를 주고 싶은 게임은 없었다
수많은 버그 다인큐 인성질 제작진들의 게임안하고 하는 패치
그리고 제일 ㅈ같은건 지들이 겜을 잘유지하고 있다고 생각하는거다
게임은 잘만들었지만 유저들과 제작진들 스스로 진입장벽을 높이는 미친겜일 뿐이다


그러니 절대로 사지마라 무조건 후회 하게된다

Очень хорошая игра есть пару косяков но думаю Админы все исправят, рекомендую )
Lots of fun, even when just starting off. Not too big of a learning curve. Even better when you know what's going on. Can't wait for future updates!
Super fun and never the same two rounds in a row. Have put many hours in on the console and the PC version is much better. Faster queues if you want to be the survivor.
É bom quando jogado com amigos.
se tu se acostumar com os bugs é um bom jogo
.ç. esse jogo e lgl e viciante pois n é lagado e não prescisa ter 1 internet tão boa e nem um compiuter zikão e volta e meia trazem novas coisas nunca perde a graça de jogar esse jogo
刚开始玩的时候以为很恐怖会很害怕，但是玩完以后发现不仅非常有意思，而且超级刺激，墙裂推荐！！！
Great game, and continues to improve
Fun and challenging.  Like any good game, it is easy to pick up and tough to master.
Very fun game, have played hours with friends. Plan to continue for a lot more. A lot of content to play through / unlock.

this game is brilliant , its forever changing and never gets stale. if you want the same stuff over and over again then this is not the game for you , if you want to adapt with the change and have fun with friends or make some new friends , this is the game for you
i play this w all my friends and we have a good time running in fear. WOuld recOMend :)
現在遊戲越來越容易斷 我懲罰時間我罰辛酸的 去你BE
um jogo bacana, mas ele peca muito nos bugs. Gosto muito do jogo e de sua comunidade, espero o jogo sempre manter esse sentimento que sempre me traz.
This game is fun for what it is :)
can get boring but play different killer/survivor and gets fun
Very replayable. I play with a friend, sometimes 2 other friends. I would say if your friends have this game, get it, it's very fun together.

A fun game in general with friends or solo and is a fun experience either you play as the killer or a survivor.
Love this game. From cooperative mode hiding from a killer or stepping in the killers shoes, this game play is intense and addicting.
fun game but my gpu couldn't handle the graphics
Post game salt as killer fuels my day man. Delicious.

Really fun game but only with friends in my opinion if you dont have any friends i would recommend trying to make friends on the disord DBD server i cant do that cause im banned from the server but you can :D

Just a heads up it has its own bugs and glitches and toxicity.
jogo muito bom, porém essa caralha fica fechando o tempo todo, dando erro nos meus arquivos. VAI TOMA NO CU.

Impossible to play non-meta killer starting rank 7. Developers constantly buff survivals in favor of casual players ignoring what happening at high ranks at all. Father more they absolutely ignorant to community and so to say suffering from success. This game is alive only because of the licensed killers and gradually the first OK game in a very specific genre.

Don't spend your money on it unless it's on sale. Maybe if the customers actually get that crown down from devs they start actually doing something to solve gameplay problems.
GREAT GAME! 1 complain... pls hide the totem... -.- or remove it from the game otherwise there is no point of having them.
Es un juego muy divertido, necesitas estar atento para las pruebas de habilidad y de repente te sale el asesino y te metes unos buenos sustos

After steam let me know that i've spent 99 hours playing this game and asking if i'd recommend this game to other players, I decided that yes, i in fact would recommend this game to others. This is one game that the developers actually seem to care. I took a long break from this game after it first launched and came back to essentially a new game. They have added content continue to work on balance issues, and just update the game in fantastic ways. It is a great game to play solo or with friends, and is just all around a good time.
best game 4ever i love this game so much very well
Un juego muy bien diseñado, perfecto para divertirte con amigos.
What? I was a rank 19 killer and i got rank 10,12 and 13 survivors to escape? also when im survivor(rank 18) i always encounter dumb people...how is that even possible?
